gene.function: FUNCTION: Tyrosine kinase of the non-receptor type, involved in the IFN-alpha/beta/gamma signal pathway (PubMed:7615558). Kinase partner for the interleukin (IL)-2 receptor (PubMed:11909529) as well as interleukin (IL)-10 receptor (PubMed:12133952). {ECO:0000269|PubMed:11909529, ECO:0000269|PubMed:7615558}.
gene.subcellularLocation: SUBCELLULAR LOCATION: Endomembrane system; Peripheral membrane protein. Note=Wholly intracellular, possibly membrane associated.
gene.domain: DOMAIN 34..420;  /note="FERM";  /evidence="ECO:0000255|PROSITE-ProRule:PRU00084"; DOMAIN 439..544;  /note="SH2";  /evidence="ECO:0000255|PROSITE-ProRule:PRU00191"; DOMAIN 583..855;  /note="Protein kinase 1";  /evidence="ECO:0000255|PROSITE-ProRule:PRU00159"; DOMAIN 875..1153;  /note="Protein kinase 2";  /evidence="ECO:0000255|PROSITE-ProRule:PRU00159"
geneOntologyBiologicalProcess: positive regulation of homotypic cell-cell adhesion [GO:0034112]
geneOntologyMolecularFunction: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity [GO:0004715]
